title: Cardano Coffee lounge in Vietnam

f6_assessments.q0:
This Proposal came up with the idea of creating a coffee-cardano community in some big cities such as Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, etc. by holding periodic meetings at suitable cafes in the area.
In Vietnam, coffee shops are very popular places to meet and exchange information. When holding periodic meetings at the cafe, everyone will know about blockchain, cardano... in a close and friendly space. People will easily access, exchange and share knowledge, so the number of participants will easily increase. Besides, when held at a cafe, it is easy to attract the curiosity of customers at the shop, who does not know blockchain, cardano through images of Cardano, Catalyst.
As such, the goal of this proposal is in line with the challenge's goal of encouraging the local community to promote Cardano adoption and awareness, growing the Cardano ecosystem.
If this project is successful, the model can be expanded to some other big cities in Vietnam such as Da Nang, Nha Trang, Vung Tau... This contributes to the expansion of the Cardano platform.
The project presented 2 risks about the Covid -19 pandemic and the legality of local event organization, including the full solution. But I have some personal opinions as follows: Proposal is calculating, estimating the number of attendees of a meeting about less than 20 people. If the number of attendees is 50 or more, it will be more difficult to find the right cafe. Therefore, if the project is approved, the proposed team should choose a suitable place to sign the contract.
In addition, if the epidemic becomes more serious, the gathering of people at the cafe will be banned or the number of participants will be restricted, so the project will be interrupted. The proposed team should anticipate coming up with a suitable solution.
f6_assessments.q1:
This proposal has a clear roadmap:
Phase 1 is a basic course and standardization: after 1 month will complete basic level training, sign a contract with a coffee to run a weekly event in at least 6 months term, complete areas of page design decoration, banners, standee, flyers. After 2 months, complete the advanced training course, conduct 3, 4 offline sharing sessions at Cardano Coffee lounge, invite more blockchain experts to participate and present key topics, deploy sharing sessions weekly basic and advanced with predefined schedule, weekly meeting.
Phase 2 is to scale up: After 3 months, replicating the model in Ho Chi Minh City, holding weekly meetings in both areas.
The above route is reasonable, easy to implement successfully.
The total cost for the project is $24,800, of which the cost of designing and producing banners, standees, flyers for Catalyst, Plutus, Haskell for both Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City, displayed on LCD screens at Coffeeshop in the events: $1,000, budget provision for discounts on coffee orders (from the audience): $1,500, event marketing and media: $1,800.
The rest $20,500 for 410 hours of labor, unit price is 50 USD/hour for the following jobs: design and create a basic course on basic Blockchain, catalysts, instructions for creating Daedalus and Yoroi wallets; searching and choosing a suitable coffee shop, labor costs to design and create advanced courses, speaker costs, recording, editing and uploading videos to youtube, project management… The above expenses on average 50 USD/hour, this level is reasonable. However, different jobs with the same unit price of 50 USD/hour are not suitable. Proposing the team to recalculate the detailed unit price to suit each type of work.
        	The project implementation staff consists of 5 people who are qualified, knowledgeable and experienced in blockchain, Cardano, interpreter, design...so suitable for the project's requirements. The community can find out information about personnel easily via Linkedin. This information is reliable. Therefore, the project can be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2:
The project has provided indicators to measure the progress and development of the project monthly, from the first to the sixth month. In the first month, the location of the first meeting cafe was announced on the website cardano2vn.io, completed telegram channels, documents for the basic training program (slides), from the second month there are specific numbers such as the number of attendees, the number of offline meetings…In the sixth month, there were 10 additional proposals to submit to Catalyst; 30 CA onboards. The project also summarizes the results of the whole project such as 20 meetings in Hanoi, 20 meetings in Ho Chi Minh City, 500 attendees, 10 proposers submit to Catalyst, 30 CA onboards, 100 new Cardano member onboards.
The Community are easy to check these metrics. In addition, the above metrics match the key metrics of the challenge: How many new hubs will be launched in 2022? How many new Cardano users were introduced?

Not over the luxury creates a sense of trust close to the top. There are also a lot of offline classes that take place in this form and are quite effective. Participants only have to pay for soft drinks. Discuss and solve the problem together in a comfortable way.
Secondly, this team as well as experience as stated in the project will create trust. Everyone has clear and fully professional background on LinkedIn, has a support team working properly, professionally. Therefore, it is likely that the first-time participant will continue to attend the next time until the end of the course.
Thirdly, the cryptocurrency market is currently a new trend that dynamic young people want to assert themselves. many young people in Viet Nam have just become rich in this market. So that the information is quite fast, a place that can exchange reliable direct learning is an opportunity not to be missed.
